alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Park County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 15 at 1:50PM MDT until June 15 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 214... SOUTH PARK... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 214. * Timing...Red Flag conditions will continue through the rest of the afternoon. Conditions will ease late this evening. * Winds...West around 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
